StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPlannedAc.vityData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode as integer, @SchoolYear as integer AS
SELECT HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN.PLAN_TYPE AS PLAN_TYPE, --ISNULL(CONVERT(CHAR(11), PLANNED_MONTH, 106),'') AS PLANNED_MONTH, IsNULL(Substring(DATENAME(MM, PLANNED_MONTH),0,4) + ' ' + CAST(YEAR(PLANNED_MONTH) AS VARCHAR(4)),'') AS PLANNED_MONTH, '' AS ACTUAL_MONTH,SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WITH (NOLOCK), HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN_TYPE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN.PLAN_TYPE=HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN_TYPE.PLAN_TYPE AND SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear
